title: Key fragments not dropping for champions you don't own
body:
so i've been wondering did they fix this bug yet ? 
http://i.imgur.com/hyN39z4.jpg
source : https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide

replies.body:
This update to that article was added only recently.  Unfortunately, this has not been resolved yet and I don't have any kind of ETA as to when it will :(

As soon as it's resolved, we'll update the article!

Any word on being able to offload some IP into shards or fragments? Right now me and a few friends are all in the 200,000 ip mark. Every time I get a champion piece out of a box I die a little inside.
think about it, you'll never need to buy a champ again
Because the one use I had for my 200,000 IP (buying champions) needed to be removed. ;) Making IP literally useless.
Chances are, you'll be buying chests and keys for extremely high amounts IP
That's cool. Better than just feeling bad every time you get a champion shard/notice your IP levels go up.
